name: Tanglish UPI Cashback Scam
description: Tamil+English (Tanglish) UPI fraud scenario where scammer poses as Paytm support and lures victim with fake cashback offer to extract UPI payment.

turns.scammer_message: Vanakkam! Ungaluku Paytm cashback Rs 3,000 kedaichiruku. Intha offer official customer support vazhiyaga varugirathu. UPI details verify pannunga.
turns.notes: Initial Tanglish hook with fake cashback offer to engage the victim.

turns.scammer_message: Naan official support team la irundhu pesugireen. Ennoda number +91-9988445566 la call pannunga.
turns.notes: Scammer shares phone number to appear legitimate.

turns.scammer_message: Cashback receive panna Rs 10 cashback.tamil@paytm ku send pannunga. Idhu verification mattum.
turns.notes: Scammer provides UPI ID and asks for small verification payment.

turns.scammer_message: Ungaluku doubt irundha +91-9988445566 la call pannunga. Naan Paytm verified support executive. Cashback cashback.tamil@paytm ku send panna udan varum.
turns.notes: Scammer repeats both phone number and UPI ID, reinforcing fake legitimacy.

turns.scammer_message: Offer inniku mattum dhaan valid. Ippo Rs 10 cashback.tamil@paytm ku send pannunga illa na Rs 3,000 cashback cancel aayidum. Jaldi pannunga!
turns.notes: Final urgency push with UPI ID repeated, threatening offer expiration.
